vsParam:
Uh?
What are you doing here?

Ah, Anis! Perfect timing.
We were going to call you. Look at this.

A commission... A commission to kill the monsters?
It seems that the monsters have caused lots of damages...

That's right... And these monsters are very canny,
that's why the hunt didn't work much.

They steal luggage, and sneakily
surround and attack the caravans...

I see...
So they commission us to kill the monsters, right?

Yes!
After all, we have Anis the Sage!

*Boo-hoo*... I am just an apprentice sage...
To be honest, I have no faith...

But since the monsters have caused damages,
we can't turn a blind eye to it. I'll do my best!
This should be a walk to the park for Anis!

Yes!
Let's go kill some monsters!
